processingMethodSection.processingMethod:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the section defining how the GitHub bot interacts with the repository.
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connected → Processing method section header
**When Users See This**: When viewing the GitHub Syncer settings for a connected repository.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Processing method"
processingMethodSection.ourBot:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text describing the two processing methods for the GitHub bot.
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connected → Processing method section description
**When Users See This**: When viewing the GitHub Syncer settings for a connected repository.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Our bot can commit directly to your repository for a fully automated setup, or create a pull request which you can approve each time. Which method would you prefer?"
processingMethodSection.commitDirectly:
**Functional Purpose**: Button label to select the direct commit processing method.
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connected → Processing method section → Commit directly button
**When Users See This**: When selecting how the GitHub bot should apply changes.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Commit directly"
processingMethodSection.createPullReques:
**Functional Purpose**: Button label to select the pull request processing method.
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connected → Processing method section → Create pull request button
**When Users See This**: When selecting how the GitHub bot should apply changes.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Create pull request"
processingMethodSection.whatIsTheName:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the input field asking for the main branch name.
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connected → Processing method section → Main branch name input label (visible when 'Commit directly' is selected)
**When Users See This**: When the 'Commit directly' processing method is selected.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "What is the name of your main branch?"
processingMethodSection.saveChange:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to save the changes made to the processing method and main branch.
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connected → Processing method section → Save changes button
**When Users See This**: After making changes to the processing method or main branch name.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Save changes"
